commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects
commonAnnotations.title: commonAnnotations

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects
commonLabels.title: commonLabels

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release
extraDeploy.title: extraDeploy

annotations.description: Additional annotations provided to the Gateway resource
annotations.title: annotations

gatewayClassName.description: Gateway class that determines the backend used. Currently supported values: "istio", "kgateway", "gke-l7-rilb", or "gke-l7-regional-external-managed"
gatewayClassName.title: gatewayClassName

kGatewayParameters.description: Special parameters applied to kGateway via GatewayParameters resource
kGatewayParameters.title: kGatewayParameters

listeners.description: items:  type: object  properties:    name:      description: Name is the name of the Listener. This name MUST be unique within a Gateway      type: string    path:      description: Path to expose via Ingress      type: string    port:      description: Port is the network port. Multiple listeners may use the same port, subject to the Listener compatibility rules      type: integer      minimum: 1      maximum: 65535    protocol:      description: Protocol specifies the network protocol this listener expects to receive      type: string @schema Set of listeners exposed via the Gateway, also propagated to the Ingress if enabled

name.description: Name is the name of the Listener. This name MUST be unique within a Gateway

port.description: Port is the network port. Multiple listeners may use the same port, subject to the Listener compatibility rules

protocol.description: Protocol specifies the network protocol this listener expects to receive

listeners.title: listeners

serviceType.description: Gateway's service type. Ingress is only available if the service type is set to NodePort. Accepted values: ["LoadBalancer", "NodePort"]
serviceType.title: serviceType

global.description: Global parameters Global Docker image parameters Please, note that this will override the image parameters, including dependencies, configured to use the global value Current available global Docker image parameters: imageRegistry, imagePullSecrets and storageClass

imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array </br> E.g. `imagePullSecrets: [myRegistryKeySecretName]`
imagePullSecrets.title: imagePullSecrets

global.title: global

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource
annotations.title: annotations

clusterRouterBase.description: used as part of the host dirivation if not specified from OCP cluster domain (dont edit)
clusterRouterBase.title: clusterRouterBase

extraHosts.description: List of additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record (e.g. a CNAME) <!-- E.g. extraHosts:   - name: llm-d.env.example.com     path: / (Optional)     pathType: Prefix (Optional)     port: 7007 (Optional) -->
extraHosts.title: extraHosts

extraTls.description:
The TLS configuration for additional hostnames to be covered with this ingress record.
Ref: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/services-networking/ingress/#tls
extraTls.title: extraTls

host.description: Hostname to be used to expose the NodePort service to the inferencing gateway
host.title: host

ingressClassName.description: Name of the IngressClass cluster resource which defines which controller will implement the resource (e.g nginx)
ingressClassName.title: ingressClassName

path.description: Path to be used to expose the full route to access the inferencing gateway
path.title: path

enabled.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.host` parameter
enabled.title: enabled

secretName.description: The name to which the TLS Secret will be called
secretName.title: secretName
